ComicInfo.Summary:
Our vampire heroes have faced undead presidents, werewolves, demons, avenging angel armies, SPAWN, even Lucifer himselfâ€¦but the battle is not yet won, and destiny will now pit them against their toughest opponent yet: SAVAGE DRAGON!
Can SeeSaw and the spider god Anansi stop the coming armageddon, or will Philadelphia become the first city to fall as Earth is scorched in the battle between Heaven and Hell?
